LanguageData.AYYarrowBandage.label: Yarrow bandages
LanguageData.AYYarrowBandage.description: A gauze made from cloth or nettle hemp infused with yarrow oil. It can be used to tend similar to medicine but is slightly less effective.
LanguageData.AYTreatedMedHerb.label: Treated Herbal Medicine
LanguageData.AYTreatedMedHerb.description: Improved Herbal medicine by infusing it with yarrow oil and aloe oil.
